attributes.action: Allow an independent inquiry into the London Bombings on the 7th of July 2005
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that an independent inquiry is held into the bombings on 7-7-05 to fully determine the extent to which the intelligent services could have prevented the bombings, why was there reports of an 'electrical surge' on the tube prior to the events, why in the official narrative only a few witness' statements were used rather than all those available.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
